\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{P_\beta} \&\& {P_{\beta +1}} \& {\cdots } \& {\varinjlim^{fil}_{ <\gamma }P_\bullet} \&\& {P_\gamma} \\
	\&\&\& M
	\arrow["{f_{\beta +1, \beta}}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{p_\beta}"', from=1-1, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{p_{\beta +1}}", from=1-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\theta_\gamma }", from=1-5, to=1-7]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_\gamma }", from=1-7, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
